Class PlayerHandlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.PlayerHandlerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerHandler

    public class PlayerHandlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerHandler
    Implements the interface to control and create players. Keeps a reference of the players.
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.
